titleStmt.title: Here begynneth the pystles and gospels, of euery Sonday, and holy daye in the yere
Bible. N.T. English. Selections.

publicationStmt.date: The yere of our lorde. M.D.xxxviij. [1538]

notesStmt.note: Bound with STC 16004: Here after foloweth the prymer in Englysshe set out alonge, after the vse of the Sarum.
Reproduction of the original in the Pierpont Morgan Library, New York City.
